name: Nikos Vertis
description: '''Nikolaos Arvanitidis''' ([[Greek language|Greek]]: Νικόλαος  Αρβανιτίδης; 21 August 1976), better known by his stage name '''Nikos Vertis''' ([[Greek language|Greek]]: Νίκος Βέρτης) is a popular [[Greek people|Greek]] singer. He was born in [[Gorinchem]], [[Netherlands]], and his origin is from Galipsos village, near [[Kavala]]. To date,{{when|date=May 2023}} he has released five studio albums along with one CD single, and two special edition CD/DVD albums.
